theoryQuestions.title: Algorithm Design Principles
theoryQuestions.description: Explain the divide and conquer algorithm design paradigm. Provide an example of a well-known algorithm that uses this approach and analyze its time complexity. Discuss the advantages and disadvantages of this approach.

rubric.criteria: Clear explanation of divide and conquer

theoryQuestions.title: Object-Oriented Programming
theoryQuestions.description: Compare and contrast inheritance and composition in object-oriented programming. When would you choose one over the other? Provide real-world examples to illustrate your points.

theoryQuestions.title: Database Normalization
theoryQuestions.description: Explain the concept of database normalization. Describe the first three normal forms (1NF, 2NF, 3NF) with examples. Why is normalization important in database design?
